summary: While travelling in continental Europe, a rich young playgirl realizes that an elderly lady seems to have disappeared from the train.
cast: Margaret Lockwood|Michael Redgrave|Paul Lukas|May Whitty|Cecil Parker|Linden Travers|Naunton Wayne|Basil Radford|Mary Clare|Emile Boreo|Googie Withers|Sally Stewart|Philip Leaver|Selma Vaz Dias|Catherine Lacey|Josephine Wilson|Charles Oliver|Kathleen Tremaine|Ernest Blyth|Wallace Bosco|Alf Casha|Alfred Hitchcock|Nan Kearns|John Miller|John More|Charles Rolfe|Roy Russell
title: Alarma en el expreso
